label: 菅原道真
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (845-903). Also referred to as Kanke 管家 (the Sugawara House"). Son of Koreyoshi. Grandfather of Sukeyoshi. "Erudite" of literature. Private kanbun collections Kanke bunsō (900) and Kanke kōshū (903). Compositions in Honchō monzui (36). Kanshi in Wakan rōeishū 和漢朗詠集 (38), Shinsen rōeishū 新撰朗詠集(12), Sakumon daitai (3). [是善、漢文、菅家文草、菅家後集、本朝文粋、漢詩、作文大体] "
